site.title: Tools4Anything

about_page.title: About Us
about_page.welcome: Welcome to Tools4Anything! We are your destination for browser-based tools, designed to make your digital life easier and more productive.
about_page.intro: It all started with a simple idea: to centralize in one place all the small utilities we find ourselves searching for again and again. We wanted to create a single, fast, secure, and completely free environment.
about_page.philosophy: Our philosophy is based on privacy, speed, and simplicity. Because the tools run client-side, your data never leaves your computer. We are committed to providing an ad-free, purely functional experience.
about_page.contact_intro: Encountered a problem? Have a suggestion for a new tool? We'd love to hear from you! You can contact us at: <0>your-email@example.com</0>

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.intro: Encountered a problem? Have a suggestion for a new tool? We'd love to hear from you! You can contact us at: <0>your-email@example.com</0>

privacy_policy_page.meta_description: Privacy Policy for {{siteName}}. We are committed to protecting your privacy. Our tools operate entirely in your browser.
privacy_policy_page.title: Privacy Policy for {{siteName}}
privacy_policy_page.intro_p1: Your privacy is critically important to us. At {{siteName}}, we have a few fundamental principles:
privacy_policy_page.principles_li1: <1>Privacy by Design:</1> Our tools are built to be client-side, meaning the data you input is processed in your browser and never sent to our servers.
privacy_policy_page.principles_li2: <1>Minimal Data Collection:</1> We only collect anonymous analytics data to understand how our site is used and to improve our services.
privacy_policy_page.data_tools_p1: We do <1>not</1> collect, store, log, or share any information that you enter or upload into our tools. All operations, such as formatting JSON, decoding JWTs, or converting images, happen locally on your computer.
privacy_policy_page.analytics_p1: We use Google Analytics to collect standard, non-personally identifiable information to analyze trends and administer the site. This may include your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. This information is used in an aggregated manner to improve the user experience.
privacy_policy_page.cookies_p1: We may use third-party advertising companies like Google AdSense to serve ads when you visit our website. These companies may use information (not including your name, address, email address, or telephone number) about your visits to this and other websites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you.
privacy_policy_page.cookies_p2: You can opt-out of personalized advertising by visiting <1>Google's Ad Settings</1>.
privacy_policy_page.changes_p1: Although most changes are likely to be minor, {{siteName}} may change its Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage visitors to frequently check this page for any changes. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
privacy_policy_page.contact_p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please feel free to <1>contact us</1>.
